Well, here's the truth: You don't need more time. You need to fix your HORMONES.

After 35, your cortisol rises (stress), testosterone drops, and estrogen increases. This hormonal imbalance SIGNALS your body to store fat in your belly - no matter how "clean" you eat or how hard you work out.

settings.heading: "Truly life changing - and I don't use that phrase lightly"
settings.description:
I travel 3 weeks per month. Live in hotels. Eat airport food. Client dinners with alcohol and heavy meals I can't refuse. Zero routine. Zero control.

Every supplement or diet I tried required "consistency" and "routine" I don't have. Keto? Can't control restaurant meals. Gym? Which gym - I'm in a different city every week.

Dryft is the ONLY thing that works with my chaotic life. I take 2 capsules every morning with hotel coffee. That's it. No meal timing, no workout requirements, no routine needed.

10 weeks in: Down 17 pounds. Gut is noticeably flatter. The constant hunger stopped - I'm not reaching for Starbucks pastries at 3 PM anymore. My energy is steady even with time zone changes.

This is the first thing that's ever worked for my lifestyle. Life changing - and I don't use that phrase lightly.

Anthony L., 46 - Management Consultant
